body: lol. That's one way to get the guy you like to notice you but ain't it easier if she just confessed that moment when she asked him a favor?

I thought it's cute cover so I ended up reading it but it left me with bad taste in mouth. I mean it would be a lot better if she would say something like she likes him or I don't know what but this guy raped girl he like this is awful.
Even if she liked him, it's still rape.
No rape tag? So does it mean what I think it is? is it?
It went from cute to rape and then back to cute very fast
